tooltip: Provides immunity to the astral infection debuff
Boosts life regen even while under the effects of a damaging debuff
While under the effects of a damaging debuff you will gain 15 defense
Press Astral Arcanum UI Toggle to toggle teleportation UI while no bosses are alive

name: Blazing Core
tooltip: The searing core of the profaned goddess
10% damage reduction
Being hit creates a miniature sun that lingers, dealing damage to nearby enemies
The sun will slowly drag enemies into it
Only one sun can be active at once
Provides a moderate amount of light in the Abyss

name: Bloodflare Core
tooltip: You lose up to half your defense after taking damage
Lost defense regenerates over time
You gain 1 health for every 1 defense gained as it regenerates

name: Bloom Stone
tooltip: One of the ancient relics
You quickly regenerate life while on the ground
This effect works best during daytime
Flowers grow if you are standing on grass
Random dye plants will grow while standing on grassless dirt

name: Celestial Jewel
tooltip: Boosts life regen even while under the effects of a damaging debuff
While under the effects of a damaging debuff you will gain 11 defense
Press Astral Teleport to teleport to a random location while no bosses are alive

name: Core of the Blood God
tooltip: 8% increased damage and damage reduction
Boosts your max HP by 10%
Healing Potions are 15% more effective
Halves enemy contact damage
When you take contact damage this effect has a 20 second cooldown

debuffs.name: Flesh Totem Cooldown
debuffs.tooltip: The Flesh Totem effect is recharging

name: Corrupt Flask
tooltip: 7% increased damage reduction and +3 defense while in the corruption

name: Cosmic Stone
tooltip: Summons a cosmic elemental to fight for you

buffs.name: Cosmic Elemental (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The cosmic elemental will protect you

name: Craw Carapace
tooltip: 5% increased damage reduction
Enemies take damage when they touch you

name: Crimson Flask
tooltip: 7% increased damage reduction and +3 defense while in the crimson

name: Crown Jewel
tooltip: Boosts life regen even while under the effects of a damaging debuff
While under the effects of a damaging debuff you will gain 8 defense

name: Cryo Stone
tooltip: One of the ancient relics
Creates a rotating ice shield around you that damages and slows down enemies on contact

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Deep Diver
tooltip: 15% increased damage, movement speed and +15 defense while underwater
While underwater you gain the ability to dash great distances

name: Deific Amulet
tooltip: Causes stars to fall and grants increased immune time when damaged
Provides life regeneration and reduces the cooldown of healing potions

name: Depths Charm
tooltip: Reduces the damage caused by the pressure of the abyss while out of breath
Removes the bleed effect caused by the upper layers of the abyss

name: Elemental in a Bottle
tooltip: Summons a sand elemental to fight for you

buffs.name: Sand Elemental (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The sand elemental will protect you

name: Elysian Aegis
tooltip: Blessed by the Profaned Flame
Grants immunity to knockback, and the Burning, On Fire! and Holy Flames debuffs
+30 max life
Grants a supreme holy flame dash
Can be used to ram enemies
Press Elysian Guard to activate buffs to all damage, crit chance, and defense
Activating this buff will reduce your movement speed and increase enemy aggro

buffs.name: Elysian Guard
buffs.tooltip: Movement speed reduced, other stats buffed

name: Eye of the Storm
tooltip: Summons a cloud elemental to fight for you

buffs.name: Cloud Elemental (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The cloud elemental will protect you

name: Flame-Licked Shell
tooltip: 35% decreased movement speed
Enemies take damage when they hit you
You move faster and lose 18 defense for 3 seconds if you take damage
Temporary immunity to lava

buffs.name: Shell Speed Boost
buffs.tooltip: Speed is boosted

name: Flesh Totem
tooltip: Halves enemy contact damage
When you take contact damage this effect has a 20 second cooldown

debuffs.name: Flesh Totem Cooldown
debuffs.tooltip: The Flesh Totem effect is recharging

name: Frigid Bulwark
tooltip: Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team
Only active above 25% life
Grants immunity to knockback
Puts a shell around the owner when below 50% life that reduces damage
The shell becomes more powerful when below 15% life and reduces damage even further

buffs.name: Ice Barrier
buffs.tooltip: Damage taken is reduced by 15%

buffs.name: Paladin's Shield (buff)
buffs.duration: Infinite (while conditions are met, and only to other players)
buffs.tooltip: 25% of damage taken will be redirected to another player

name: Frost Barrier
tooltip: You will freeze enemies near you when you are struck
You are immune to the chilled debuff

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Fungal Carapace
tooltip: You emit a mushroom spore explosion when you are hit

name: Fungal Clump
tooltip: Summons a fungal clump to fight for you
The clump latches onto enemies and steals their life for you

buffs.name: Fungal Clump (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The fungal clump will protect you

name: Giant Pearl
tooltip: You have a light aura around you
Enemies within the aura are slowed down
Does not work while a boss is alive
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss

name: Giant Shell
tooltip: 15% reduced movement speed and 5% damage reduction
Taking a hit will make you move very fast for a short time

buffs.name: Shell Speed Boost
buffs.tooltip: Speed is boosted

name: Giant Tortoise Shell
tooltip: 10% decreased movement speed
Enemies take damage when they hit you

name: Gravistar Sabaton
tooltip: Tap the DOWN key to increase your fall speed for 5 seconds
This has a 8 second cooldown
Striking the ground with increased fall speed will cause an astral explosion

name: Heart of the Elements
tooltip: The heart of the world
Summons all elementals to protect you

buffs.name: Heart of the Elements (buff)
buffs.tooltip: All elementals will protect you

name: Hide of Astrum Deus
tooltip: Taking damage, or inflicting a true melee strike, drops an immense amount of astral stars from the sky
Taking damage boosts true melee damage by 50%
Boost duration is based on the amount of damage you took, the higher the damage the longer the boost
Provides immunity to the astral infection, cursed inferno, on fire, and frostburn debuffs
Enemies take damage when they hit you and are inflicted with the astral infection debuff

name: Honey Dew
tooltip: 5% increased damage reduction, plus 9 defense and increased life regen while in the Jungle
Poison and Venom immunity
Honey-like life regen with no speed penalty
Most bee/hornet enemies and projectiles do 75% damage to you

name: Howl's Heart
tooltip: Summons Howl to fight for you, Calcifer to light your way, and Turnip-Head to follow you around
Placing this accessory in vanity slots will summon the trio without the combat or exploration utilities

buffs.name: Howl's Heart (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Howl protects you, Calcifer lights your way, Turnip-Head stalks you

name: Laudanum
tooltip: Converts certain debuffs into buffs and extends their durations
Debuffs affected: Darkness, Blackout, Confused, Slow, Weak, Broken Armor,
Armor Crunch, War Cleave, Chilled, Ichor and Obstructed
Revengeance drop

name: Lead Core
tooltip: Grants immunity to the irradiated debuff

name: Living Dew
tooltip: 5% increased damage reduction, +5 defense, and increased life regen while in the Jungle
Immunity to Poison

name: Metamorphic Stone
tooltip: Summons an earth elemental to fight for you

buffs.name: Earth Elemental (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The earth elemental will protect you

name: Mutated Truffle
tooltip: Summons a small Old Duke to fight for you
When below 50% life, it moves much faster

buffs.name: Mini Old Duke (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The young duke will protect you

name: Ornate Shield
tooltip: Boosted damage reduction and health while wearing the Daedalus armor
Grants a frost dash

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Pearl of Enthrallment
tooltip: Summons a water elemental to fight for you
The elemental stays above you, shooting water spears, ice mist, and treble clefs at nearby enemies

buffs.name: Anahita (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Anahita will protect you

name: Permafrost's Concoction
tooltip: Increases maximum mana by 50 and reduces mana cost by 15%
Increases life regen as life decreases
Increases life regen when afflicted with Poison, On Fire, or Brimstone Flames
You will survive fatal damage and revive with 30% life on a 3 minute cooldown
You are encased in an ice barrier for 3 seconds when revived

buffs.name: Encased
buffs.tooltip: 30 defense and +30% damage reduction, but...

name: Profaned Soul Artifact
tooltip: Purity
Summons a healer guardian which heals for a certain amount of health every few seconds
Summons a defensive guardian if you have at least 10 minion slots, which boosts your movement speed and your damage resistance
Summons an offensive guardian if you are wearing the tarragon summoner set (or stronger), which boosts your summon damage and your minion slots
If you get hit, most of their effects will disappear for 5 seconds

debuffs.name: Burnt Out
debuffs.tooltip: You've been burnt out and your guardians are less effective

buffs.name: The Profaned Soul
buffs.tooltip: The healer will heal your wounds (Only Healer) The Defensive Duo will protect and heal you! (Healer + Defensive) The Offensive Duo will fight for and heal you! (Healer + Offensive) The Profaned Babs will fight for and defend you! (All Three)

name: Profaned Soul Crystal
tooltip: Transforms Melee attacks into a barrage of spears
Transforms Magic attacks into a powerful splitting fireball
Transforms Ranged attacks into a flurry of fireballs and meteors
Transforms Rogue attacks into a deadly crystalline spiral
And so we burn it all in the name of purity

debuffs.name: Burnt Out
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (when hit before Exo Mechs and Supreme Calamitas are defeated)
debuffs.tooltip: You've been burnt out and your guardians are less effective

debuffs.name: Holy Flames
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (On minion hits pre-Exo Mechs and Supreme Calamitas)10 seconds (On minion hits post-Exo Mechs and Supreme Calamitas)

buffs.name: Devotion
buffs.tooltip: You are an emissary of the profaned goddess now!The light of the sun empowers your offensive capabilities

buffs.name: The Profaned Soul
buffs.tooltip: The healer will heal your wounds (Only Healer)The Defensive Duo will protect and heal you! (Healer + Defensive)The Offensive Duo will fight for and heal you! (Healer + Offensive)The Profaned Babs will fight for and defend you! (All Three)

Provides life regeneration and reduces the cooldown of healing potions

buffs.name: Rare Sand Elemental (buff)

name: Regenator
tooltip: Reduces max HP by 50% but greatly improves life regeneration

name: Rose Stone
tooltip: One of the ancient relics
Summons a brimstone elemental to fight for you

buffs.name: Brimstone Elemental (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The brimstone elemental will protect you

name: Rover Drive
tooltip: Activates a protective shield that grants 15 defense for 10 seconds
The shield then dissipates and recharges for 20 seconds before being reactivated

name: Sea Shell
tooltip: Increased defense and damage reduction when submerged in liquid
Increased movement speed when submerged in liquid

name: Shield of the Ocean
tooltip: Increased defense by 5 when submerged in liquid
Increases movement speed and life regen while wearing the Victide armor

name: Stress Pills
tooltip: Boosts your defense by 4 and max movement speed and acceleration by 5%
Receiving a hit causes you to only lose half of your max adrenaline rather than all of it
Revengeance drop

name: The Absorber
tooltip: 5% increased movement and jump speed
+20 max life and mana
Standing still boosts life and mana regen
Increased defense, movement speed and damage reduction while submerged in liquid
Enemies take damage when they hit you
You emit a cloud of mushroom spores when you are hit
10% increased damage reduction
3% reduced stealth costs
5% of the damage from enemy attacks is absorbed and converted into healing

name: The Camper
tooltip: In rest may we find victory.
You deal 90% less damage unless stationary
Standing still grants buff(s) dependent on what weapon you're holding
Standing still provides a damaging aura around you
While moving, you regenerate health as if standing still
Provides a small amount of light in the Abyss

buffs.name: Cozy Fire
buffs.tooltip: Life regen is slightly increased

buffs.name: Heart Lamp (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Life regen is increased

buffs.name: Well Fed
buffs.tooltip: Minor improvements to all statsMinor improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration

name: The Community
tooltip: The heart of (most of) the Terraria community
Starts off with weak buffs to all of your stats
The stat buffs become more powerful as you progress
Reduces the DoT effects of harmful debuffs inflicted on you
Thank you to all of my supporters that made this mod a reality

name: The Evolution
tooltip: You reflect projectiles when they hit you
Reflected projectiles deal no damage to you
This reflect has a 120 second cooldown which is shared with all other dodges and reflects
If this effect triggers you get a health regeneration boost for 5 seconds
If the same enemy projectile type hits you again you will resist its damage 15%

name: The Sponge
tooltip: 15% increased damage reduction
+30 max life and mana
5% increased movement and jump speed
Standing still boosts life and mana regen
Increased defense, movement speed and damage reduction while submerged in liquid
Enemies take damage when they hit you
You emit a cloud of mushroom spores and sparks when you are hit
2% reduced stealth costs
6.25% of the damage from enemy attacks is absorbed and converted into healing
Increased healing as health lowers
Dying revives you inside of an encumbering shell for 3 seconds with a 1 minute cooldown
Generates an energy shield over 1 minute that takes one hit

name: The Transformer
tooltip: Taking damage releases a blast of sparks
Immunity to Electrified and you resist all electrical projectile and enemy damage
Enemy bullets do half damage to you and are reflected back at the enemy for 800% their original damage

name: Trinket of Chi
tooltip: After 1 second of standing still and not attacking you gain a buff
The buff boosts your damage by 50% and decreases damage taken by 15%
The buff deactivates if you move or attack once

buffs.name: Chi
buffs.tooltip: Your next attack is boosted and you are more resilient

name: Universal Stone
tooltip: The true potential of a lesser elemental
Summons an cosmic conflict construct to fight for you
Summons a cosmic shield around you that inflicts God Slayer Inferno
Collecting Cosmichid plants boosts damage by 1% up to 30%
While the item's visibility is on, Mana Sickness is replaced with Mana Burn
50% increased flight time

buffs.name: Cosmic Conflict Construct (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The cosmic conflict construct will protect you

name: Ursa Sergeant
tooltip: 15% reduced movement speed
Immune to Astral Infection and Feral Bite
Increased regeneration at lower health

name: Zenith Arcanum
tooltip: Top of the food chain
Summons various spirits of the world to protect you
20% increase to summon damage and defense
+4 life regeneration, 15% increased pick speed, and +8 max minions
Increased minion knockback
Minions inflict a variety of debuffs and spawn skeletal limbs on enemy hits

buffs.name: The World (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The world will protect you
